profiles.i18n_desc: PikaOS Xbox One Controller driver package (xone+xpad+xpadneo) (Recommended)
profiles.i18n_desc[en_US]: PikaOS Xbox One Controller driver package (xone+xpad+xpadneo) (Recommended)
profiles.check_script: dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}' xpadneo-dkms 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed" && dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}' xpad-noone-dkms 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed" && dpkg-query -W -f='${Status}' xone-dkms 2>/dev/null | grep "install ok installed"
